projects.title: Khmer Dev
projects.description: A side project that I built with a team of 3 people, I was responsible for the backend. KhmerDev is a website that allow people to learn code for free in khmer. Frontend is built using ReactJS, TailwindCss. Backend is built using NestJs, PostgresSQL, Redis and Docker.

projects.title: KaksekAI
projects.description: Kasekai is a Khmer-language mobile application designed to empower Cambodian farmers through smart features like land measurement, AI-powered crop analysis, and a farming assistant, offering personalized recommendations based on location, soil, and weather—with full offline support for rural accessibility. It is built using Flutter, Weather API, Gemini Vison API, Gemini Text Generation API, Google Maps, Firebase.
